possible_choices: In contrast to PFA, DKT does not use a sigmoid function at the output.
In contrast to PFA and BKT, DKT does not provide a direct estimate of the student's skill.
In contrast to PFA and BKT, DKT does not assume a fixed number of tasks.
In contrast to BKT, DKT does not need student data for training.
choice_explanations: No, it is the other way around.
